creator: cl.houze@wanadoo.fr
text:
I could not find the sources in the v2 distribution zip
I could not find it in the log4j zip (except old classes)
I could not find it there: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/logging-log4j/

thanks for a valid pointer

Christian-Luc

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
See http://logging.apache.org/site/repositories.html.

For example,

svn co http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/chainsaw/trunk chainsaw

creator: psmith@apache.org
text: Closing this off since it's not a bug.
